thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A true gem of a hotel
thread.title_full: A true gem of a hotel - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: E1660GXjonathanh
title: A true gem of a hotel
text: The wife and I recently stayed 4 nights at this hotel in a executive king room. The Hotel's staff was very attentive and the location and price can not be beat in London. We were 600 yards from Buckingham Palace and a quarter of a mile from Westminster. This will be our hotel of choice on all our future trips to London.
